title: FS: T206 Cobbs, Youngs and rare O'Hara

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobbs, Youngs and rare O'Hara
posts.post_content:
CY YOUNG W/ GLOVE SGC 60 EX 5:$1250.00
Cy Young (bare hand shows) - SGC 80 EX/NM 6:$2200.00
Ty Cobb (Bat on Shoulder) PSA 4: $1650.00
Ty Cobb (Bat Off) SGC 4: $1600.00
Bill O'Hara, St. Louis, Polar Bear Back PSA 3 VG: $2,750

Prices above include shipping. Message/Email for scans. PayPal gift preferred.
Just curious why you'd go to the trouble of scanning these but not remove them from the plastic baggies that reduce the clarity of details?

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=1221124]Just curious why you'd go to the trouble of scanning these but not remove them from the plastic baggies that reduce the clarity of details?[/QUOTE]

Those aren't scans, they're photos
